The hardwood flooring extends into the nicely sized bedrooms. Another standout feature is the inclusion of both an off-street parking space and a deeded garage. A definite plus! With these incredible features and its move-in ready condition, this apartment is truly a must-see. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this your new home.
